patthana22.21:4.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:5.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa … pe … purejāte āsevane cuddasa … pe … avigate pannarasa.
patthana22.21:6.1: Napītisahagataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:8.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:9.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.21:10.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cuddasa.
patthana22.21:12.1: Naācayagāmiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:13.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.21:14.1: Nasekkhaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.21:15.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
